message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $8,500 is just a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $9,000, which is still a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's close this deal!
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,200. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Bob, I'm starting to run out of time here. $8,200 just isn't going to work for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $8,600. This is my final offer. If we don't agree, I'm going to have to move on to another buyer.
I understand you're running out of time, but I'm still not willing to go above $8,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
